task.title: Creating a segment from a row of channel data
task.shortdesc: You can save a segment that is composed of customers who completed specific actions within a channel.

step.cmd: Click the Report status menu in the top navigation bar.
Select the report that you want to open.
To access the Expanded view of a path, click one of the channel icons in the path, or click Options and select Expanded view from the Actions menu.
Click an event node in the Aggregates view.
To create a segment from a row of channel data, click the menu icon next to the row.
Enter a name for the segment.

taskbody.result: The new segment is available from the Segments menu on the Path analysis page when you create a path report.
